{{html:
<em>Provide other users access to your Cloud Space by adding their Mothership1 user name.</em>
<form ng-submit="addUser()"  ng-controller="CloudSpaceAccessManagementController">
<div class="table-responsive margin-top-medium">
    <table class="table users-table">
        <tr class="header">
            <th class="username-text-container">
                <input type="text" ng-change="userError=Null" placeholder="Username or email address" class="username-text" ng-model="newUser.nameOrEmail" required="required">
            </th>
            <th><input type="submit" class="btn" value="Add"></input></th>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan=2 ng-cloak ng-show="userError">
                <div class="alert alert-error margin-bottom-none">
                    {[ userError ]}
                </div>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr ng-cloak ng-repeat="user in currentSpace.acl">
            <td>{[user.userGroupId]}</td>
            <td><a href="#" ng-click="deleteUser(currentSpace, user)" class="fa fa-times"></a></td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</div>
</form>

<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/CloudSpaceAccessManagementController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}
